properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08, DNC 19.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN VICINITY
48-26.28N 015-06.30W AT 141811Z JAN. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4413 2631 7575, FAX: 4413 2631 8342,
E-MAIL: ZONE38@HMCG.GOV.UK.
